title.rendered: Aviator Airlines Head Office: Ticket Booking and Fleet

content.rendered:
Aviator Airlines is an Egyptian airline based at Cairo International Airport that operates charter services to domestic and international destinations. The carrier operates flights using a leased Boeing 737-500 from EgyptAir.

 

 

 

Aviator Airlines Address : Aviator Airport Alliance AB
Generatorgatan 11, Box 118
190 46 Stockholm-Arlanda Sweden

Phone : 559070-3368

Aviator Airlines Official website : https://www.aviator.eu/

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Aviator Airlines

  • Boeing 737-500

Queries handled by Aviator Airlines Customer care:

Schedule, eBooking, Rescheduling, Track and Trace, Charter Service Queries, Trucking service Queries, e-claims Flight Information, Missing Luggage, Delayed Flights. Pharma, pets, valuable, perishable goods and extra care shipment queries.

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Aviator Airlines Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Aviator Airlines : (click on the stars below)
